data.description: Get width or columns of texts on terminal
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is related with character and text handling, thus I
    think Text:: is appropriate. Methods of mbwidth() and mbswidth()
    return width of given text (i.e., number of columns which the text
    occupies), which the name CharWidth came from.

    There are no modules which handles width of characters and texts in
    locale-dependent way (i.e., following locale automatically).
